contextId.occurrenceNote: This is how letters were started. The name of the author can be made explicit. Alternate translation: "I, John the elder, am writing this letter to the chosen lady and her children" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
contextId.glQuote: From the elder to the chosen lady and her children

contextId.occurrenceNote: Here, "beginning" refers to "when we first believed." Alternate translation: "but I am writing to you what Christ commanded us to do when we first believed. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
contextId.glQuote: but one that we have had from the beginning
